XY.message: The current extension version is no longer supported. Please update to the latest version.

chromesysDownloadSaveAsPrompt.message: Ask where to save each file before downloading

confirmCreateWhenNotExists.message: $1 does not exist. Would you like to create it?

errorFileOrFolderExists.message: A file or folder with that name already exists

errorNoID.message: Failed to add new task because there are too many tasks in the Manager. Please remove some unwanted tasks and try again.

errorRemovedFromChrome.message: The task may have been removed from browser.

errorUnknownReloadPage.message: Something went wrong. Please reload the page to continue.

labelChooseDownloadLocation.message: Choose a new location using system dialogue

labelNamePreviewIncomplete.message: Name preview (some parts may become available after download begins):

labelUnableSaveToFolder.message: When unable to save to the destination folder

labelUseLastLocation.message: Save file to last used location

msgChangeCookiePrefs.message: Cookie preferences can be updated anytime in $1 > $2.

msgChromeI18nLanguage.message: Chrono uses the same language as your browser.

msgFolderDisabledNonWritable.message: Folder selection functionality is disabled. Please make sure the default downloads location is not set to a system folder, and the browser's Save As dialogue is turned off.

msgPreviewPdfViewer.message: PDF Viewer is required for the preview, please enable it in $1.

msgRateShareNoWebStoreName.message: If you find $1 useful, please give us a ★★★★★ review and share it with your friends!

msgSettingsUpdatedReload.message: Settings have changed. Please refresh the page to apply the updates.

optItemOverrideChrome.message: Override browser's downloads page and enable $1 keyboard shortcut

optItemWinMode.message: Open downloads manager as standalone window

tipOptSectionOneClick.message: If enabled, download will start immediately when you click on a link, using default task settings (see above), without prompting a dialog for setting Naming Mask etc. Note that browser's 'Save As' dialog may still show up, click on the tip to see how to disable it.

tipOptSectionTaskDefaults.message: Default settings to be applied when adding new tasks, e.g.  One-Click downloads

tipmsgWindowMode.message: Download manager can now open in a standalone window instead of a browser tab. To adjust this setting, go to $1 > $2 > $3.

translateContributors.message: zach, RaceProUK, tom, Thomas Thorne, Callum McLean, Jarva, milesmuso.mf, Steve Whitaker etc.

updateLogMessage_v0_12_0_mv3.message:
After several months of work, Chrono Download Manager has now been upgraded to the latest Chrome Manifest V3, following all best practices for Chrome extensions. This means it now uses less memory and resources on your computer, and you'll no longer see any deprecation warnings in Chrome. 
Looking ahead, we're excited to keep improving CDM with updates that enhance your experience and ensure the extension remains sustainable for the future. Thank you for your continued support!
